briefTitle: A 52 Week Study to Evaluate the Effects of Losartan With or Without HCTZ on Plasma Glucose, Metabolic Parameters, Blood Pressure in Hypertensive Patients With Metabolic Syndrome (0954A-331)
officialTitle: 52 Week Study to Evaluate the Effects of LOSARTAN 50 mg, 100 mg, 100/12.5 mg HCTZ, 100/25 mg HCTZ on Metabolic Parameters, Blood Pressure and Safety in Hypertensive Patients With Metabolic Syndrome
summary: To determine if a one year treatment Losartan with or without HCTZ at different dosages have an effect on metabolic parameters in patients with hypertension and the metabolic syndrome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Hemoglobin A1c Between 52 Weeks and Baseline
